mapper.update: update crud_st_item set zoneid = #{zoneid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playername = #{playername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyname = #{keyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `count` = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, zoneid, playername, keyname, `count`, `type` from crud_st_item
